Lyric:
[by:幼兽i]
[00:35.88]Sunbeam lights are streamin on the waves
[00:40.63]Shadows are made, and the sky turns grey
[00:44.72]It's 5 o' clock and I'm feelin the same
[00:49.83]My body is cold and I'm going through pain
[00:53.79]No words are spoken but I hear your name
[00:58.77]Echoed around a waiting game
[01:02.76]My soul is broken, my bodies in pain
[01:07.79]Now that I know that this won't go away　×2
[01:13.66] 
[01:19.75]You know, like, like, I would always think
[01:21.33]Uh, you know, what if I make the wrong move? 
[01:23.46]But maybe there isn't any right move
[01:26.75]You know? I mean, look at us
[01:30.64]You know, we all dress the same, we all talk the same
[01:34.76]We all fuck the same, we all watch the same TV
[01:38.63]Nobody's really different, even if they think they're different
[01:42.56]‘Oh, boy, look at my tattoo, you know?’
[01:49.49] 
[01:56.09]And see, that's what makes me freak
[01:57.74]Because I can do anything I want ,
[02:00.73]As long as I don't care about the result
[02:04.63]Anything is possible
[02:06.75]It is night on planet earth and I'm alive
[02:15.72]And someday I'll be dead
[02:17.22]Someday I'll just be bones in a box
[02:19.17]But right now, I', not
[02:21.58]And anything is possible
